mods.abstract: Photograph on Page 12 shows a Louisiana agricultural exhibit titled "Where Nature Smiles" featuring an arrangement of produce and products from the state. Exhibited at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport. Signage reads "You can plant every month and every day in the year in Louisiana".
mods.note: Alternate views of this photograph found on Page 7, image 150 and Page 20, image 149.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
